Title: Relates to the visibility of enclosed entranceways and stairways between buildings
Summary: Relates to the visibility of enclosed entranceways and stairways between buildings; requires a pane of fire and heat resistant transparent material to allow for visibility and safe passage through such doors.
LawCode: Amd ยง378, Exec L; amd ยง52, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the multiple dwelling law, in relation to visibility of enclosed internal stairwells of buildings
